bug.author: richardliaw
bug.summary: [tests] Github actions should not use wheel
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
Currently, Github action dockers are built off of the latest Ray wheel. We should build Ray from scratch to make sure test failures are caught upon breakage. cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/simon-mo>@simon-mo</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: to be clear this was the original implementation in jenkins. You actually want to build it from source?

I don't think that's true... see this commit before the github actions migration (run_multi_node_test is what runs on Ray-PRB):
ray/ci/jenkins_tests/run_multi_node_tests.sh
Lines 14 to 16 in 3bd82d0
DOCKER_SHA=$($ROOT_DIR/../../build-docker.sh --output-sha --no-cache)
SUPPRESS_OUTPUT=$ROOT_DIR/../suppress_output
echo "Using Docker image" $DOCKER_SHA
and build-docker.sh builds from source (docker/examples): <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ray-project/ray/blob/3bd82d0bcde525f47f9b2d04a0e3470204bb216a/build-docker.sh>https://github.com/ray-project/ray/blob/3bd82d0bcde525f47f9b2d04a0e3470204bb216a/build-docker.sh</denchmark-link>
run_multi_node_test.sh then calls run_tune_test.sh with the SHA provided:
ray/ci/jenkins_tests/run_multi_node_tests.sh
Line 25 in 3bd82d0
bash $ROOT_DIR/run_tune_tests.sh ${MEMORY_SIZE} ${SHM_SIZE} $DOCKER_SHA
Now, run_tune_test.sh will use docker/tune-tests (which only downloads from wheel( if no SHA is provided, which is not the case if you're on Jenkins:
ray/ci/jenkins_tests/run_tune_tests.sh
Lines 22 to 30 in 3bd82d0
if [ "$DOCKER_SHA" == "" ]; then
echo "Building application docker."
docker build -q --no-cache -t ray-project/base-deps docker/base-deps
# Add Ray source
git rev-parse HEAD > ./docker/tune_test/git-rev
git archive -o ./docker/tune_test/ray.tar $(git rev-parse HEAD)
DOCKER_SHA=$(docker build --no-cache -q -t ray-project/tune_test docker/tune_test)
fi
(sorry, it's a bit confusing... feel free to ask questions)
